description: This file defines enemy AI logic for a platformer game, including a WalkerSlime class for patrol enemies, a factory function for creating enemy instances based on type, and a top-level update function for processing enemy states each game tick.

classes.name: WalkerSlime
classes.description: Class representing a simple patrol enemy ('slime') that moves horizontally between defined patrol boundaries, turning upon reaching each boundary.

methods.name: constructor(opts = {})
methods.description: Initializes a WalkerSlime object with position, direction, patrol boundaries, and speed based on options.

methods.name: update(dt)
methods.description: Updates the enemy's position based on its current direction and speed, and changes direction if it hits patrol boundaries.

methods.name: createEnemyInstance(data)
methods.description: Factory function that creates an enemy object based on provided data; currently supports only 'walker' type.

methods.name: updateEnemies(enemiesState, dt)
methods.description: Top-level function that updates all enemy entities in the given array, invoking their update method if available.
